###4.9
Examining Data
The "Views" pull-down menu allows you to view data relevant to the current location.
Select "Call Stack" from the Views menu.
The Call Stack View displays the current function and call hierarchy, including functions, arguments, and locations.  Double-clicking a frame in the Call-Stack displays the function's code.
Double-click the do-accel stack frame to return to the current PC location.
Double-click the "iterate" stack frame to shift the stack to the "iterate" function.  
The source code for iterate now appears in the source code display area with the call to the current frame highlighted.
Click on the bottom right arrow to continue.


Array Browser
Call Stack
Disassembly View
Exception View
Execution View
Expression View
File Browser
Memory View
Process Meter
Register View
Signal Panel
Source View
Structure Browser  Alt+B
Syscall Panel

X/Motif Analyzer

The source code for do_accel now appears in the source code display area with the call to the current frame highlighted.
